name: My FIRST and LAST flight on an Airbus A310 - AIR TRANSAT CLUB CLASS REVIEW
description:
WATCH: QATAR A350 BUSINESS CLASS!  https://youtu.be/6pS8cEqpTpk

 Welcome aboard Air Transat's A310 between Paris CDG and Quebec City! This aircraft was retired just a month after I flew it! I hope you enjoy coming with me on this unique trip.

Read my exclusive written review at: https://simpleflying.com/air-transat-a310-review/

Follow me on Twitter: @paul_winginit ¦ https://twitter.com/paul_winginit

Follow me on Instagram: paul_winginit ¦ https://www.instagram.com/paul_winginit

My website: www.winginit.me

Date of Travel: 28 FEB 2020
Airline: Air Transat
Livery: Standard Air Transat
Route: CDG-YQB
Aircraft: Airbus A310-200
Flight Number: TS 413
Miles: 3295
Airborne time: 6h58m

If you want to find out more about my future plans and join in conversations I have about travel, follow me on Twitter: @paul_winginit. 

Make sure you have your notifications set! 🛎 

_____________________________________

Do you have any ideas for future trip reports? Something you've never seen on YouTube before? Why not suggest it to me in the comments? I read every single one! 👍🏻

Enjoy the video, and thanks for watching. If you subscribe, then thanks for being part of the channel!

#paulstripreports #vlog #review #flying #travel #aviation #avgeek #trains
